update.description:
Grab bag of minor changes

* 5a863dc: Update header guards

* 4c78158: Convert existing private raw `dataPtr`'s to `unique_ptr`

* 381f38c: Assorted fixes in SimbodyLink, rendering/CameraPrivate.hh and SensorManager

* 9a33e92: WirelessTransceiver: move default values of power and gain to header file

The net result of the final three commits is unboosting some function and bind. It also ported some unboosting of `replace_all` with `std::regex`, but that was causing the test failures in pull request #2022, so I redacted that.

This is also hopefully easy to review.
update.title: PIMPL sensors: 2nd subset of pull request #2022

content.raw: Nate did this in the `pimpl_contactsensor` pull request. I kind of like having it in the header file. If we made it standard practice to set default values for all primitive types (`int`, `bool`, `double`, etc) in the header, then it could help avoid problems with uninitialized variables.
content.html: Nate did this in the pimpl_contactsensor pull request. I kind of like having it in the header file. If we made it standard practice to set default values for all primitive types (int, bool, double, etc) in the header, then it could help avoid problems with uninitialized variables.
